p: I bought him as a slave for life if I chose to keep him as such - no condi- tions as to the time he was to serve contained in the Bill of Sale
The court adjudjes that Petitioner be discharged is illegally restrained of his freedom and entitled to be dis- charged -
Arrested before & committed by Just- ice Johnson under the afft of John Lakin - on 30th June 1858-
